column5: is there any way to check and see if bass pro has an item in stock i am looking at getting this kayak    http://www.basspro.com/webapp/wcs/stores/s...0006000_200-6-6  i am going up to the kawarthas and need a kayak and dont want to stop there and find out they dont have it
have you tried the good 'ole telephone?
bass pro is like zellers in many respects   were the lowest stock is the law, everyday!!!!
lol nope just seeing if i can see on the web first     so low chance of them haveing it?
Nope you have to call the store or go there in person.  the customer service 1 800 line could not help.
1 Bass Pro Mills Drive Vaughan, ONT L4K 5W4 Phone: 905 761 4000
